column3: â€œI feel toasted off 2 bong rips. It took maybe 5 minutes for effects to kick in and then bam! I just got more and more blazed feeling. I feel toasted. Squinted feeling to my eyes, very heavy head feeling and stoned in my brain feeling. I feel slow as heck in my mind. I feel focused at the same time. I don't know about the taste. It tastes like really good clean bud. Just good delicious clean meds. Great stuff. I just ...â€

â€œSurprisingly sweet tasting and smooth, Phantom OG is a strong Indica  that comes on with a whisper, and ends with a roar.  Phantom OG is best reserved for a lazy evening, or as a sleep aid, for its effects are uplifting for the first 30 minutes, then prepare for an inner-eyelid examination or a nice R.E.M. session.â€

â€œSold to me as Phantom Kush at Greenhand in Seattle. Great strain. High quality bud that smells great and tastes great. Gets me giggly as shit and feeling hilarious every time. Not the best for sleep, so just know that going into it.â€

â€œnice citrus earth taste upon inhale with a headrush that left me feeling as if my head was going to float away. After 5 minutes it settled in my body leaving me in a state of deep relaxation. Awesome Indica.
o_Oâ€
â€œ*constant nodding head up and down get this strain
column5: it makes you feel like you got picked up by some warm pillows and got shipped away to Cozystan.â€"

column3: â€œWow, Just wow. Citrusy, Piney, with alil hint of what smelled like caerosene. The taste, was a mixture of the same as above. The buzz happened in 5 mins, but after 20 I was toast. Very good strain I would recommend this to all. Great for stress and anxiety, and the pain reliever in it is sweet.â€

â€œSurprisingly sweet tasting and smooth, Phantom OG is a strong Indica  that comes on with a whisper, and ends with a roar.  Phantom OG is best reserved for a lazy evening, or as a sleep aid, for its effects are uplifting for the first 30 minutes, then prepare for an inner-eyelid examination or a nice R.E.M. session.â€

â€œQuite good. I smoked two bowls to myself over the course of about an hour. Not overwhelming, but very relaxing. I have several joint injuries and they were all flaring up from work. After smoking, my muscles had loosened enough that I was able to pop some things back into place. My muscle soreness and joint pain is still present, but much more manageable. I plan to smoke some more and expect it will lessen even more ...â€

â€œI smoke for insomnia, and Iâ€™ve had dozens of strains and Phantom is by far my favorite one that Iâ€™ve ever tried. I feel a real nice, happy high for about 30 minutes to an hour, and then my eyes just start to close by themselves and once I lay down Iâ€™m asleep within what feels like seconds. 10/10 recommend if you have trouble falling asleep. Works like a charm.â€

â€œSmells great, looked great, tasted great. 

Hit smooth, quick effect. 

Happy and giggly, great for eating and being hungry, relaxing enjoyable highâ€

â€œPhantom is super heavy. A great indica with a potent violet and flowery taste; Phantom will draw you in and then hit you fast and hard. I ate an entire box of crackers, cookies, and several bowls of cereal before passing out.......3 nights in a row.â€

â€œAfter a very long day, I decided to wind down with some Phantom OG I purchased from Golden Leaf Wellness near Avondale, AZ. It was recommended by the bud tender, Alan, and on sale for $9/g. 

I loaded a bowl into my bong after a late dinner. Within a few minutes I was a little giggly and happy. I just remember wanting to play and chat with my wife. Within another few minutes, all talking stopped. My eyelids became su...â€

â€œ4.5 stars out of 5 for this strong effects Indica dominate Hybrid strain. I got happy & uplifted followed by relaxexed & sleepy, getting the Sativa effects then the Indica ones. Pine, skunk, lemon, & earthy were the tastes & smells. Medium green & golden yellow buds with burnt orange pistils & crystal trichomes. California strikes gold again with it's Phantom OG!â€

â€œThis was one of the first indicas I've tried, and it certainly has it's good qualities. It begins with a heavy head high (though not very cerebral) that eventually spreads throughout the body, leaving you feeling like you've just had a full body massage. I would highly recommend it for pain or insomnia. The only downside would be that has lingering effects that almost feel like a hangover. I only use it at night, and...â€

â€œPhantom is a nice indica on the lighter side of the scale compared to some of the heavier (Nine Pound Hammer, The White, etc...) sleep aids.  This is nice for times when there are still things to do yet need/want to be medicated or high for whatever reason.  Moderate pain relief is offered with elevated mood enhancement.  

What I call a two part strain starting out giggly & euphoric for the first quarter of the buzz...â€

â€œTook a few bong rips and it takes a while to hit you... so tuck yourself in and put on some soft music because in no time, you will finally fall asleep and feel a full on head & body high. I love this... because I am a stressing student who stays up late completing assignments & binging on my favorite shows instead of sleeping. It's relaxing and gives you a warm tingling feeling, like after eating Thanksgiving dinner...â€
â€œvery goodâ€

â€œSold to me as an indica called Phantom Kush" by Greenhand. Delicious taste that lasts throughout the entire bowl. Had a good time with lots of laughs and euphoria during the soaring high. Equally stimulating for the mind as well as the body. Would def toke again.â€"

â€œPhantom is a nice indica on the lighter side of the scale compared to some of the heavier (Nine Pound Hammer, The White, etc...) sleep aids. â€œWow, this bud is amazing. I started to feel buzzed soon after my 4th exhale. But when the bowl was gone, so was I! It gives you an amazing body high with plenty of relaxation, with a nice mind high. I was very talkative and had a bad case of the giggles. Great bud for stress or pain!â€

â€œTook a few bong rips and it takes a while to hit you... so tuck yourself in and put on some soft music because in no time, you will finally fall asleep and feel a full on head & body high. I love this... because I am a stressing student who stays up late completing assignments & binging on my favorite shows instead of sleeping. It's relaxing and gives you a warm tingling feeling, like after eating Thanksgiving dinner...â€

â€œOne of the dopest dopes I've ever smoked. Gave me a bomb ass body high, very tingly yet relaxed. Very uplifted and happy head high as well. As far as smell it was like heaven nothing out of the ordinary but a very strong earthy all natural smell. Pretty pungent and earthy taste. Hits pretty hard But definitely a top shelf budâ€
â€œThis stuff keeps me way too focused. Borderline paranoid, but that's just me.â€
â€œone of the best srains. leaves you mellow.â€

â€œThis strain burns smooth no matter how you choose to fire it up; the calming effects are deep, nearly sedative, but allowing enough mindful activity to keep you functioning smoothly (but likely in slow motion). When using this to treat lack of sleep, I found that I could crash almost instantly and stay in a deep sleep for hours at a time. The stellar floral taste is what bumps it up an extra star for me; the aroma is...â€
â€œpretty good, really pine-y...like OD. (: Overall a mellow highâ€
â€œSome purp in there too really really niceâ€

â€œUPDATE: I've grown to like this strain! In my opinion, this is best appreciated when you have a little bit of experience under your belt. I now enjoy the benefits from this strain with out the fear of the head high. And now the body feeling you get is quiet relaxing and lowers my pain to almost gone. I will now buy this when it's available...

â€œEarthy and slightly spicy but mellow tasting indica.  Does as described by Leafly; ie nice body high and relaxing.  Good for those of us with anxiety.  I don't think it makes me as sedated as described but be careful if your not used to indicas before driving, etc.  Otherwise, a nice, mellow-inducing and tasty indica that pairs well with chill vibes (musicalsuggestion: Popul Vuh or post rock).â€
â€œVery powerful high then you just drop to relaxation... Great on Weekends after a long week.â€

Doesn't give u instant body high relaxation...it creeps up. So, first smoke, then prepare yourself to that body high and enjoy. ğŸ™‚â€

â€œFelt very relaxed through my entire body, gave me extremely strong chronic pain relief, also gives you a case of the munchies. I was focused on whatever I was doing, buzz made me happy and it was a medum chairlock situation.â€

â€œBud smells and tastes smooth and earthy, slightly fruity. Smoked a bowl of this to myself and at ease, relaxed, sleepy, with a very happy head high.  Just rolled a j with this and Blue Dream, was to die for. Made it sweeter and even more uplifting. You're in your own world.â€

â€œWhew! Wee! Really sharp over activity at first with a steady decline into an overall body high. Great looking purple buds. It was a little hard to keep lit in my bowl but could have been my own fault?â€
â€œBy far the greatest strain I've had. Two bowls and you're toasted into an interstellar loop. He high lasts very long. Head high into a muscle relaxation.â€

â€œ1st time ever hearing about this up until 3 days ago. this earthy smelling OG will not disappoint. I have took 2 pulls off my vape and let me tell you I already feel it. it's a happy, relaxing feeling. great for anytime smokeâ€

â€œThis strain sort of gave me a feeling of anxiety. My head hurt tremendously, and my stress levels increased quite a bit. The next morning after smoking this strain my head felt very cloudy. My experience with this strain might not apply to everyone, but it's definitely a strain I don't plan on smoking ever again.â€

 strain phantom og is a planetary strain... but not an indica. speedy first rush,,, I'm missing the wash of the indicaâ€
